title: Ex-Gold (Currently High Silver) Support main LF ADC Duo and Clash Team
body:
Just Decided that I should start looking for a good duo or a team to join for when Clash comes out later in the year.
If you're silver or gold and you're looking for a support main to play with or to join your team, then hit me up.

I got discord and I usually play on weekends (Fridays/Saturdays/Sundays) since I have work during the week, sometimes I get days off, so I'll obviously be playing then as well.
Add me ingame if you want to discuss anything else.

**IGN: HealBot Soraka**
